content.p: Welcome to our department Follow us on LinkedIn This is the place that innovates the future. We develop exceptional engineers and designers who solve real-world challenges and help make a greener planet spin a little smoother. Here you get the space, support, skills and connections to revel in the real world. Create cutting-edge tools and technologies involving aerospace, energy, heat, ergonomics, materials, robotics, product design and more. From career-advancing courses to our world-leading research, our engineers are highly sought after in a diverse range of industries – including aerospace, energy, advanced manufacturing, automotive, biomedical and more.
